total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the pattern of the color change in the examples. In this case, the color 8 changes to color 3.
Q2: Identify the shape or pattern of the colored cells in the input grid. In this case, the colored cells form a specific pattern.
Q3: Identify if there are any other colors or patterns in the input grid that affect the transformation. In this case, the color 1 does not seem to affect the transformation.
Q4: Apply the identified color change to the input grid of the quiz, while maintaining the identified shape or pattern.
